description: This is a simple app demonstrating language switching.
hero.heading: Welcome to Donna Vino, your unique wine experience.
hero.paragraph: Discover unique wine stories told by your sommelier while your private chef customizes the menu.
pcard.big-left.heading: Wine tasting with dinner
pcard.big-left.paragraph: Experience an unforgettable Italian wine dinner guided by sommelier Katrine Giorgio. Discover rare wines paired with antipasti, pasta, and dessert prepared by our chef Riccardo Lara.
pcard.big-right.heading: Wine tasting with dinner for companies
pcard.big-right.paragraph: Strengthen team bonds with a tailored Italian wine tasting experience. Perfect for team building, networking, or a relaxing evening with dinner.
pcard.small-left.heading: Our Team
pcard.small-left.paragraph: Meet our team — passionate, balanced, and complex, like a fine wine. Click below to discover the people behind our exceptional tastings and selections.
pcard.small-right.heading: Our Values
pcard.small-right.paragraph: Our values blend sustainability, natural methods, and craftsmanship—creating wines with authenticity and character. Click below to explore the principles behind every bottle we offer.
subscribe.heading: Subscribe to our newsletter
subscribe.paragraph: Stay up to date with the latest news related to Donna Vino and our popular wine tastings in the Copenhagen area.
subscribe.terms: I agree with the terms and conditions for subscribing to the newsletter
unsubscribe-request.heading: Request to Unsubscribe from Our Newsletter
unsubscribe-request.paragraph1: We're sorry to see you go! If you'd like to unsubscribe from our newsletter, please submit the request below.
unsubscribe-request.paragraph2: By unsubscribing, you'll no longer receive our latest updates, exclusive content, and special offers. However, you can always subscribe again if you change your mind!
unsubscribe-request.error-token: The unsubscribe token is missing or invalid. Please check your email or contact us for assistance.
unsubscribe-request.error-general: An error occurred while processing your unsubscribe request. Please try again later.
unsubscribed.heading: Unsubscription Successful
unsubscribed.paragraph: Your request to unsubscribe from our newsletter has been processed successfully. You will no longer receive our updates, exclusive content, or special offers.
unsubscribed.thank-you: Thank you for your time! If you change your mind, you can always resubscribe to receive updates and offers again.
verify.heading: Finalize your subscription
verify.paragraph1: Thank you for signing up and verifying your email!
verify.paragraph2: To complete the verification of your newsletter subscription, please click the button below to confirm your email.
verify.paragraph3: This will ensure you receive our exclusive updates, special offers, and curated wine experiences. We look forward to welcoming you on this exciting journey with us!
verify.error-token: Verification token is missing. Please check your email link.
verify.error-general: An error occurred during verification. Please try again.
confirmed.heading: Thank you for verifying your email
confirmed.paragraph1: Thank you for confirming your email address. You are now successfully subscribed to our newsletter!
confirmed.paragraph2: You'll receive our latest updates, exclusive content, and special offers as we release them. If at any time you wish to unsubscribe, you can do so by clicking the unsubscribe link in any of our emails.
confirmed.paragraph3: We're excited to have you on this journey with us!
values.heading: Donna Vino Values
values.p2: Your destination for authentic Italian flavours.
values.p3: Donna Vino is the result of former Michelin sommelier Katrine Giorgio's passion for unique Italian wine. The vision is to provide guests with unique Italian flavours and the opportunity to discover wines from passionate winemakers who prioritise sustainable production. Unique flavours and sustainability go hand in hand for several reasons.
thematic.p1-start: Sustainably farmed vineyards prioritize healthy soil and a thriving ecosystem, fostering biodiversity that enhances the quality and character of the grapes
thematic.p1-end: . This meticulous approach to farming not only protects the environment but also allows the wines to authentically reflect the unique terroir in which they are cultivated. The result is a distinctive flavor profile that captures the essence of the land, offering a true expression of its climate, soil composition, and natural surroundings. By choosing sustainably produced wines, you support practices that prioritize long-term environmental stewardship while enjoying exceptional wines crafted with care and respect for nature.
thematic.p2-start: A meticulous approach to every step of the winemaking process, from vineyard to bottle, ensures a richer flavor profile, greater complexity, and unique
thematic.p2-end: characteristics that reflect both the terroir and the winemaker's distinct style. This dedication begins with careful cultivation of the vines, fostering healthy grapes that embody the essence of the land. It continues through precise harvesting, fermentation, and aging techniques, each tailored to enhance the wine’s natural qualities. The result is a harmonious blend of tradition, craftsmanship, and innovation, delivering wines that tell a story of their origin while showcasing the artistry of the winemaker.
thematic.p3-start: The use of natural yeast strains, naturally present on the grapes and within the winery, rather than commercial yeast strains
thematic.p3-end: , plays a pivotal role in creating wines with a distinctive character. This approach not only enhances the authenticity of the winemaking process but also contributes to a broader spectrum of aromas and flavor profiles. By embracing the wild yeasts native to the vineyard and cellar environment, winemakers allow the unique terroir to shine through, capturing the subtle nuances of the region’s soil, climate, and grape variety. This commitment to natural fermentation results in wines that are complex, expressive, and deeply rooted in their origin, offering a true reflection of nature’s influence and the artistry of the winemaker.
thematic.p4-start: The winemakers prioritize a minimalist approach, allowing the grapes and the unique qualities of the vineyard to take center stage
thematic.p4-end: . By avoiding excessive manipulation, additives, or chemicals, they craft wines that reflect the true essence of their origin. The result is a genuine and authentic flavor profile, showcasing the purity of the fruit and the natural character of the terroir. This commitment to letting nature lead creates wines that are both expressive and harmonious, offering an honest representation of the vineyard's identity.
team.heading: Our Awesome Team
team.paragraph: Meet our team! At Donna Vino, our team of wine experts, chefs, digital creators, and marketing specialists work together to curate authentic Italian wine selections, craft exceptional tasting experiences, and deliver a seamless online journey that connects wine lovers with exclusive content and events.
team.kat.title: Founder
team.kat.description: Sommelier Katrine Giorgio, with 15 years of experience in the restaurant industry, including the Michelin-starred restaurant Era Ora and the organic biotrattoria Che Fè, specializes in Italian wine pairing. Her Italian background and education in sommeliership and hospitality management give her a unique understanding of how wine can elevate a gastronomic experience. She handpick wines from small, passionate producers who respect the terroir.
team.dav.title: Chief Web Officer
team.dav.description: Designer and Web project manager with 10 years of experience. Fun Fact? I once wanted to introduce myself in Danish and instead of saying ‘nice to meet you’ I said ‘seagull pleasure’.
team.ric.title: Head Chef & Laminata Owner
team.ric.description: The menus of our tasting sessions are crafted by chef Riccardo Lara from Sardinia, who arrived in Denmark in 2019. With experience at 108, Ché Fè, and Seaside Toldboden, he now runs Laminata in Frederiksberg, specializing in handmade, fresh pasta. His passion and refined taste ensure an unforgettable dining experience.
team.and.title: Sales & BDR

team.ux/ui-project-manager: UX/UI Designer and Design Project Manager
team.1.description: Music has been my passion since childhood, leading me to study it alongside Social Communication. I now use web development to enhance connections, fostering personal growth and societal advancement.
team.2.description: I'm a computer engineer passionate about programming. Off the clock, I'm usually on the football field. I fell in love with the game in Argentina.  In my downtime, I explore my creative side drawing manga and anime.
team.3.description: Yuejiao is a full-stack developer. From nutrition to tech, she passionates about building apps that promote well-being and sustainability, blending health science with code to make a meaningful impact on people’s lives.
team.4.description: Simon quit his teaching job in 2023 to follow his passion for programming. He shares an equal amount of passion for his hobbies - music, disc golf, board games and watching series (to name a few). Simon is most comfortable working in the frontend, and enjoys making the design come to life through code.
team.5.description: I'm a Full-Stack Developer skilled in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL, with growing AWS expertise. Passionate about problem-solving, AI, and fintech, I build scalable, user-friendly applications while continuously learning cloud technologies.
team.6.description: Web developer trained in Spain, writing code in the morning and serving up great experiences as a waiter in the evening.
team.8.description: I’m a Full-Stack Developer with a background in digital marketing and communications. With a strong eye for detail and a passion for clean, intuitive design, I enjoy building accessible, user-centered web applications while constantly expanding my technical skills
team.9.description: I am a Full-Stack Developer who transitioned from 12 years in finance to tech. Passionate about web development and exploring new technologies, I use my business experience to build user-friendly applications and create solutions that genuinely make a positive difference.
team.10.description: Full Stack Developer with a background in Accounting and a Master’s in Information Security. I build secure, scalable web applications and use my cybersecurity and analytical skills to deliver user-focused, maintainable products with modern frameworks and cloud technologies.
team.11.description: I have several years of experience working as a developer, mostly with backend in c#.NET. Recently I have also gained some more experience with frontend frameworks like React. I am a structured, self motivated and goal-oriented person and my interest in programming has grown since the beginning
team.12.description: I’m a fullstack developer with over 10 years of experience in layout design. I’m detail-oriented and thrive in collaborative environments, contributing to the creation of accessible and user-friendly interfaces. Always eager to learn and grow alongside the team.
team.13.description: I help merchants thrive by providing advanced technical support on the world’s leading e-commerce platform. With experience in Shopify, customer service, and web design, I’m passionate about improving online store performance and delivering excellent user experiences
team.19.description: In this project, I am responsible for all strategic design decisions, task creation and management, and key choices related to design direction. I bring a diverse background as a professional pianist and singer, hold a Master’s Degree in Digital Arts, and have certifications in AI. My work is driven by a strong interest in technology and innovation
team.20.description: Multidisciplinary UX/UI designer with international experience, blending design expertise with project coordination. Skilled in cross-functional collaboration, sprint planning, and usability. Passionate about inclusive design and delivering user-centered solutions that align with business goals in both B2B and B2C environments
team.21.description: I’m a UX/UI Designer at Donna Vino ApS, passionate about creating user-friendly and visually striking designs. With a background in design and engineering, I focus on building seamless digital experiences that balance aesthetics, functionality, and user needs
team.22.description: I'm a UI/UX Designer with a background in Communication Design and currently completing a Master’s in Digital and Interaction Design at Politecnico di Milano. I focus on crafting intuitive and engaging interfaces for web and mobile platforms, enhancing overall user experience.
team.23.description: In this project, I am responsible for all strategic design decisions, task creation and management, and key choices related to design direction. I bring a diverse background as a professional pianist and singer, hold a Master’s Degree in Digital Arts, and have certifications in AI. My work is driven by a strong interest in technology and innovation
team.24.description: As a UX/UI Designer, I joined the product team to help shape Donna Vino’s responsive website for both desktop and mobile. I contributed to user flows, interface design, and the development of a cohesive design system. With a background in architecture, I bring a fresh perspective combining spatial awareness and visual hierarchy to create intuitive, functional, and visually engaging experiences
team.25.description: I'm a creative, empathetic Digital Product Designer with a background in Cognitive Psychology and Ergonomics. Trained at the Apple Developer Academy, I craft user-centered, intuitive, and impactful experiences that blend functionality with visual appeal to solve real user needs
team.26.description: With a background in Languages for Business, I soon realized that wasn’t my path and found my true passion in design. I’m fuelled by sun and warm weather—when it’s out, you’ll find me hiking, walking for hours, or enjoying any kind of outdoor activity
team.27.description: I’m a UI/UX designer driven by a passion for transforming complex challenges into intuitive, impactful design solutions. With a professional background in illustration and art direction, my approach is to create engaging designs that connect visually and functionally with users
contact.upper.heading: Get in touch with us
contact.upper.paragraph: We’d love to hear from you! If you have any questions, feedback, or need assistance, feel free to reach out. You can use the contact form here, and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.heading: Where can you find us?
cookie.p: We use essential cookies to ensure the functionality of the site. By continuing, you agree to the use of these cookies. Read our
privacy.p2: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit our website
privacy.p3: We do not collect personal data unless you contact us directly. However, we may collect:
privacy.item1-p: To improve our website, we use cookies and analytics tools
privacy.item2-p: only if you voluntarily reach out via email or contact forms
privacy.p4: We use the collected data to
privacy.item3: Improve the performance and user experience of our website.
privacy.item4: Respond to inquiries if you contact us.
privacy.p5-3: sell or share your data with third parties.
privacy.p5: We use cookies to analyze website traffic. You can accept or reject cookies via your browser settings. For more details, see our
privacy.p6: As a visitor from Denmark or the EU, you have rights regarding your personal data, including:
privacy.item5: The right to access, correct, or delete your data.
privacy.item6: The right to object to data processing.
privacy.item7: The right to withdraw consent (e.g., disabling cookies).
privacy.p7: To exercise your rights, contact us at
privacy.p8: We may update this policy. Any changes will be posted on this page with a revised "Last updated" date.
privacy.p9: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
modal.p: Our eCommerce platform and booking calendar are currently being created and updated and will be live as soon as possible. In the meantime, feel free to contact us for any inquiries, or you can simply close this modal.
